sentences.en: " Opium, was originally called ` foreign tobacco'- "
"Opium" is a provocative, sensual, and voluptuous fragrance which makes all your senses vibrate.
sentences.cn: “鸦片”是一种刺激性的、能引起感官快感的香料，能使你所有的感官兴奋起来。

sentences.en: Aurora felt the opium haze enfold her.
sentences.cn: 奥萝拉感觉自己被笼罩在鸦片烟霾中。

sentences.en: He was forced to take opium to kill the pain.
sentences.cn: 他被迫服用鸦片来止痛。

sentences.en: If you smoke opium, give it up.
sentences.cn: 如果你吸鸦片, 就戒掉吧.

sentences.en: Morphine is a white bitter substance obtained from opium and used in medicine to reduce pain.
sentences.cn: 吗啡是从鸦片中提炼出的苦味的白色物体,用作减痛的药物.

sentences.en: One day, a friend offered her a pipe and opium.
sentences.cn: 一天，一个朋友给了她一根烟管和鸦片。

sentences.en: One of the most dangerous illegal narcotics in use today is opium.
sentences.cn: 目前最危险的违禁麻醉品之一是鸦片.

sentences.en: Opium is classed under the head of narcotic.
sentences.cn: 鸦片是归入麻醉剂一类的东西.

sentences.en: Opium is classed under the head of narcotics.
Opium taking is prohibited by law.
Strychnine, arsenic, and opium are poison.
sentences.cn: 马钱子碱 、 砷和鸦片都是毒药.

sentences.en: That man gave her a dose of opium.
sentences.cn: 那男人给了她一剂鸦片.

sentences.en: The use of opium was not criminalized until fairly recently.
sentences.cn: 直到最近抽鸦片才被判定为非法。

sentences.en: They use opium as a sedative, rather than as a narcotic.
sentences.cn: 他们把鸦片用作镇静剂而不是毒品。

sentences.en: This reminds us of the 150 kilograms of opium that Siam presented to his court in 1584.
sentences.cn: 这使我们联想起1584年暹罗国曾经向明朝廷进贡150千克鸦片的史料记载。

phrases.tran_cn: n. [史]鸦片战争（1839-1842年中英间的战争）

trans.tran_en: a powerful illegal drug made from poppy seeds. Drugs made from opium are used to reduce severe pain.
